databaseChangeLog:
xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.23.xsd">
create table if not exists transaction( id bigserial primary key, transaction_number bigint not null unique, transaction_type varchar not null, transaction_amount decimal(15,3) not null, transaction_time timestamp not null, sender_account_id bigint not null, beneficiary_account_id bigint not null, foreign key (sender_account_id) references account (id), foreign key (beneficiary_account_id) references account (id) )
